Demand response.Description: Demand response programs rely on smart grid technology to efficiently manage and control electricity consumption.
Demand response can be used to optimize the utilization of renewable energy resources by adjusting electricity demand based on their availability.
Energy storage systems play a crucial role in demand response by storing excess electricity during low demand periods and supplying it during high demand periods.
Demand response can be used to manage the charging of electric vehicles, ensuring that they are charged during off-peak hours to reduce strain on the grid.
